meanings.definition: A place of learning, such as a school or university.
meanings.sent1: The local academes provide education to students in the area.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue higher education at one of the prestigious academes in the city.
meanings.sent3: The academes were so full of knowledge that they seemed to glow with wisdom.
meanings.sent4: In the vast academes of knowledge, she found her true calling.
meanings.sent5: The academes stood tall, like beacons of enlightenment in the community.

meanings.definition: The academic community or world of scholars.
meanings.sent1: The academes gathered to discuss the latest research findings.
meanings.sent2: She was well-respected in the academes for her groundbreaking work.
meanings.sent3: The academes were abuzz with excitement over the upcoming conference.
meanings.sent4: In the academes of science, he was considered a pioneer.
meanings.sent5: The academes were like a close-knit family, supporting each other's endeavors.
